name: Update an author
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and informative,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove authors.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and informative,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove authors.

to end with:
  "Jr."

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of an author
Given an author exists in the bookstore
When I change selected information for that author

parameters.name: author
parameters.value: Author[id=1, idBook=1, firstName=First Name 1 Jr., lastName=Last Name 1]

steps.name: Then the updated information about the author is visible to users

Expecting actual:

to end with:
